00039 CellCache::CellCache()
00040   : m_alloc(), m_cell_map(std::less<const SerializedKey>(), Alloc(m_alloc)),
00041     m_deletes(0), m_collisions(0), m_frozen(false) {
00042   assert(Config::properties); // requires Config::init* first
00043   m_alloc.set_bufsize( (size_t)Config::get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.AccessGroup.CellCache.PageSize") );
00044 }

00049 void CellCache::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00050   SerializedKey new_key;
00051   uint8_t *ptr;
00052   size_t total_len = key.length + value.length();
00053 
00054   assert(!m_frozen);
00055 
00056   new_key.ptr = ptr = (uint8_t *)m_alloc.allocate(total_len);
00057 
00058   memcpy(ptr, key.serial.ptr, key.length);
00059   ptr += key.length;
00060 
00061   value.write(ptr);
00062 
00063   if (! m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type(new_key, key.length)).second) {
00064     m_collisions++;
00065     HT_WARNF("Collision detected key insert (row = %s)", new_key.row());
00066   }
00067   else {
00068     if (key.flag <= FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00069       m_deletes++;
00070   }
00071 }

00082 void CellCache::get_split_rows(std::vector<std::string> &split_rows) {
00083   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00084   if (m_cell_map.size() > 2) {
00085     CellMap::const_iterator iter = m_cell_map.begin();
00086     size_t i=0, mid = m_cell_map.size() / 2;
00087     for (i=0; i<mid; i++)
00088       ++iter;
00089     split_rows.push_back((*iter).first.row());
00090   }
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095 void CellCache::get_rows(std::vector<std::string> &rows) {
00096   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00097   const char *row, *last_row = "";
00098   for (CellMap::const_iterator iter = m_cell_map.begin();
00099        iter != m_cell_map.end(); ++iter) {
00100     row = (*iter).first.row();
00101     if (strcmp(row, last_row)) {
00102       rows.push_back(row);
00103       last_row = row;
00104     }
00105   }
00106 }

00110 CellListScanner *CellCache::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) {
00111   CellCachePtr cellcache(this);
00112   return new CellCacheScanner(cellcache, scan_ctx);
